title: 7.4.1 Create FindingsService with filtering
body:
## Parent Issue
#32 - 7.4 Findings Management System

## Objective
Implement findings service with comprehensive filtering.

## Filters
- severity (critical, high, medium, low)
- resource_type (s3_bucket, ec2_instance, etc.)
- status (open, acknowledged, resolved, false_positive)
- compliance_framework (HIPAA, SOC2, etc.)
- search (full-text on title/description)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/findings.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/schemas/findings.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
